name: 8 Ball Pool - Fun Ball Games
description:
If you love a relaxed game of 8 ball, this is the game for you!
Pocket as many balls as you can in this challenging billiard game!
Adjust the direction of the cue and set the power of your shot!
Be quick as the time is limited per level.!
To earn bonus time, make sure to sink the balls into the holes with a star.!
Can you achieve a high score?
Just have fun playing pool!!
